author: Universal Pictures
description:
The Jackal (Bruce Willis) lines up his custom sniper rig for a public assassination attempt on the First Lady, but things don’t go as planned. Declan Mulqueen (Richard Gere) and the FBI race to intervene as the shot is fired. 

Buy/Rent The Jackal!  
Amazon: https://www.amazon.ca/Jackal-Blu-ray-Bruce-Willis/dp/B074QVQ1MV
YouTube Movies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cnQ052Apg6g
Prime Video: https://www.amazon.com/Jackal-Bruce-Willis/dp/B001VLXQSU
Apple TV: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cnQ052Apg6g

Bruce Willis, Richard Gere and Sidney Poitier star in this international suspense thriller directed by Michael Caton-Jones. A ruthless assassin (Willis) has been hired to eliminate someone at the very top of the U.S. government. Constantly changing his identity and location, he is known only as the Jackal. Everything about this hit man, including his sinister timetable, is a secret. Aware of the Jackal's presence but uncertain of his purpose, the FBI's Deputy Director (Poitier) faces th
title: The Jackal | Assassination Attempt on the First Lady
